pkgmetadata.longdescription: Property-Based Testing // Hedgehog will eat all your bugs. 'Hedgehog' is a property-based testing package in the spirit of 'QuickCheck'. With 'Hedgehog', one can test properties of their programs against randomly generated input, providing far superior test coverage compared to unit testing. One of the key benefits of 'Hedgehog' is integrated shrinking of counterexamples, which allows one to quickly find the cause of bugs, given salient examples when incorrect behaviour occurs.
